title: Bloomberg Markets: Senate Adopts Budget for Fiscal 2018
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Senate Adopts Budget for Fiscal 2018
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010Erik Wasson\u0010Congressional Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010\u0010Isaac Boltansky\u0010Senior VP/Policy Analyst\u0010Compass Point Research & Trading \u0010Discussing the Senate approving a new budget and what that means for tax reform.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
